title: I lost my old account
body: Hi,  i've been playing league for 3-4 years maybe even longer and i've quit inbetween those 3-4 years, i lost my old account i remember the password but i forgot the username if anyone could help me it'd be appreciatedðŸ˜Š

replies.body: We should be able to help out here!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help locate your older account and restore access.  We'll see you there.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Jv1WAPWY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-03T16:16:23.271+0000)
>
> We should be able to help out here!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help locate your older account and restore access.  We'll see you there.  :D

yeah i'm not getting captchas
There might be a block or extension getting in the way, but just in case you can also reach out via support@riotgames.com.
nevermind got the captcha after reloading 30times and deleting the browser history thanks

Hey, yeah we can reply back to your email.  Can you toss me the URL you're using and getting the captcha error?  Is the language on the top right of that page sent to English?  Trying to get more info so we can figure out what's causing this.

What's the exact error message that you're getting when trying to submit?  Can you grab a screenshot?

Screenshot: https://imgur.com/a/AkJDK 
The difference was there was no captcha but its fixed for me now after i deleted my browser history
